content: User limit exceeded. To proceed to the next step, please adjust the number of users or increase the {{productName}} user limit.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message when the number of users exceeds the licensed limit. It prompts the user to adjust the number of users or increase the product user limit to proceed. This text appears on a Users Info Block component in the Portal Settings page.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'překročení uživatelského limitu' is a literal translation of 'User limit exceeded'. While understandable, a more natural and idiomatic Czech would be something like 'Dosažen maximální počet uživatelů' or 'Překročeno maximální povolený počet uživatelů'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dosažen maximální počet uživatelů.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing 'upravte počet uživatelů nebo zvyšte limit uživatelů {{productName}}' could be slightly improved for better flow. The repetition of 'uživatelů' is a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: upravte počet uživatelů nebo zvyšte limit pro {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Ole hyvä ja" is overly formal and a bit clunky in this context. It's not incorrect, but it doesn't flow naturally.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Simply use 'Muokkaa' or 'Lisää' directly, like: 'Muokkaa käyttäjämäärää tai lisää...'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The construction 'jatkaaksesi seuraavaan vaiheeseen' (to proceed to the next step) is a bit verbose. It could be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'jatkaaksesi' or 'seuraavaan vaiheeseen' to make it more concise.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'augmenter la limite d'utilisateurs de {{productName}}' is slightly awkward. While technically correct, it could be improved for clarity and naturalness.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: augmenter la limite d'utilisateurs de {{productName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'օգտատերերի' (ogtatereri) is repeated unnecessarily. It should be used consistently either as 'օգտատիրոջ' or 'օգտատերերի' depending on the intended meaning (singular possessive vs. plural).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider revising to either: 'Օգտատիրոջ սահմանաչափը գերազանցվել է: Հաջորդ քայլին անցնելու համար խնդրում ենք կարգավորել օգտատերերի թիվը կամ ավելացնել {{productName}}-ի օգտատերերի սահմանաչափը.' or 'Օգտատիրոջ սահմանաչափը գերազանցվել է: Հաջորդ քայլին անցնելու համար խնդրում ենք կարգավորել օգտատիրոջ թիվը կամ ավելացնել {{productName}}-ի օգտատերերի սահմանաչափը:'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "modificare il numero di utenti" is a bit awkward. A more natural translation would be 'ridurre il numero di utenti' (reduce the number of users) or 'diminuire il numero di utenti' (decrease the number of users). 'Modificare' is too general and doesn't convey the necessary action.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ridurre il numero di utenti o diminuire il numero di utenti

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Italian translation retains the English variable {{productName}}. It is better to localize this variable, assuming a localized name exists for the product.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider localizing {{productName}} to the Italian equivalent of the product name. For example, if the product is 'AwesomeApp', the variable could become '{{nomeProdotto}}' and the translation would be 'aumentare il limite di utenti di {{nomeProdotto}}'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation includes a space before the variable {{productName}}. It should be directly attached to the preceding word.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເກີນຂີດຈຳກັດຜູ້ໃຊ້ແລ້ວ. ເພື່ອສືບຕໍ່ຂັ້ນຕອນຕໍ່ໄປ, ກະລຸນາປັບຈຳນວນຜູ້ໃຊ້ ຫຼືເພີ່ມຂີດຈຳກັດຜູ້ໃຊ້{{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Polish translation includes '{{productName}}' which mirrors the English content. While not inherently incorrect, it's crucial to verify that '{{productName}}' will be correctly replaced with the product name within the application and that the surrounding punctuation is handled appropriately in the context of the UI.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Confirm that '{{productName}}' is correctly handled by the translation system and displays the product name properly. Consider if a space is needed before/after the variable.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'To proceed to the next step' is a bit literal and clunky in Portuguese. A more natural phrasing would be 'Para continuar' or 'Para avançar'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Para continuar para a próxima etapa, ajuste o número de usuários ou aumente o limite de usuários do {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'aumente o limite de usuários do {{productName}}' is a bit verbose. A more concise and natural translation would be 'aumente o limite do {{productName}}'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Limite de usuários excedido. Para continuar para a próxima etapa, ajuste o número de usuários ou aumente o limite do {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and a bit clunky. 'Para prosseguir para a próxima etapa' is not the most natural phrasing in Portuguese. A more natural way to say it would be 'Para continuar' or 'Para avançar'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Para continuar ou Para avançar.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'definiți numărul de utilizatori' is not the best translation for 'adjust the number of users'.  'definiți' implies definition, not adjustment.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Modificați numărul de utilizatori

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The space before '{{productName}}' is unnecessary.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: creșteți limita de utilizatori {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Превышен лимит пользователя" is a literal translation of "User limit exceeded." While understandable, a more natural phrasing in Russian might be "Достигнут лимит пользователей" or "Превышен максимальное количество пользователей."  The first option emphasizes the limit has been reached, the second is closer to the original but slightly less idiomatic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Достигнут лимит пользователей

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The placement of {{productName}} is identical to the English version. While acceptable, consider if the placement is optimal for readability in the Russian context. It is not inherently wrong, but could be improved depending on the overall UI.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change needed, but review for UI context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්' (parishrilekayin) seems to be a misspelling of 'පරිශ්‍රමකරුවන්' (parishramakaruwan) which means 'users' or 'workers'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්' with 'පරිශ්‍රමකරුවන්'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ඊළඟ පියවරට යාමට' (ilagna piyavarta yamaata) is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'ඊළඟ පියවර යාමට'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change 'ඊළඟ පියවරට යාමට' to 'ඊළඟ පියවර යාමට'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'කරුණාකර' (karunakarada) translates to 'please', it's a bit formal for a user-facing message.  It may be unnecessarily stiff.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing 'කරුණාකර' for a more conversational tone, resulting in 'පරිශ්‍රමකරුවන් ගණන වෙනස් කරන්න'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation includes unnecessary spaces around the `{{productName}}` variable. It should be directly adjacent to the preceding word.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Limit používateľa prekročený. Ak chcete prejsť k ďalšiemu kroku, upravte počet používateľov alebo zvýšte limit používateľov{{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'adjust the number of users' is a bit awkward in Slovenian. A more natural phrasing would be 'zmanjšajte število uporabnikov' (reduce the number of users). While 'prilagodite število uporabnikov' isn't wrong, it's less idiomatic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: zmanjšajte število uporabnikov

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The variable {{productName}} is correctly formatted, but it's important to ensure the surrounding spaces remain consistent with other instances of variable usage within the application. Consistent spacing is crucial for proper rendering.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure consistent spacing around the {{productName}} variable aligns with existing style guides.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The possessive suffix '-а' is attached to '{{productName}}' which may not be the correct grammatical construction depending on the product name. It needs to align with the specific rules of Serbian grammar for possessive suffixes based on the gender of '{{productName}}'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Review the possessive suffix based on the gender of '{{productName}}'. It might require adjustment to be grammatically correct.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Da biste prešli na sledeći korak' is a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing would be 'Da biste mogli da pređete na sledeći korak' or 'Kako biste mogli da pređete na sledeći korak'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Da biste mogli da pređete na sledeći korak.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The possessive form '{{productName}}-a' is not ideal. A more standard and readable Serbian construction would be 'za {{productName}}'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: za {{productName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'простору {{productName}}' (space {{productName}}) feels awkward and isn't a direct or natural translation of the English '{{productName}} user limit'. It implies a physical space or container. The intention is to describe a user limit associated with the product.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Перевищено ліміт користувачів. Щоб перейти до наступного кроку, налаштуйте кількість користувачів або збільште ліміт користувачів для {{productName}}.
